links.title: Environmental, Social and Governance

[Skip to content](#content)

[Menu](#menu-mobile) [SpartanNash: The Food Solutions Company](/)

[Home](/) > ESG and Community Engagement

# ESG and Community Engagement

SpartanNash’s success relies on the strength and wellbeing of our Associates, customers and communities — all key components of **_Our Winning Recipe_** ™. Our commitment to corporate responsibility comprises our Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) efforts, community engagement and philanthropy. 

In 2023, we published our**[2022 Environmental, Social and Governance Report](https://www.spartannash.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/SpartanNash_ESG_2022_FINAL.pdf)**, sharing our progress along this journey, as well as a look ahead.

## [ Our Commitments  Learn more about our Environmental, Social and Governance initiatives  ](https://www.spartannash.com/corp-responsibility/our-commitments/)

## [ Environmental  We are committed to optimizing our operations to reduce our energy usage, waste and carbon footprint  ](https://www.spartannash.com/corp-responsibility/environment/)

## [ Social  We are a **People First** employer, and we champion the causes that matter most in the local communities we serve  ](https://www.spartannash.com/corp-responsibility/social-responsibility/)

## [ Governance  We reinforce a culture of corporate integrity and ensure the quality and continuity of corporate leadership  ](https://www.spartannash.com/investors/management/)
